Package org.skistation.services

Class TicketService

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.services.TicketService
@Service public class TicketService extends Object
Represents a ticket service class. It provides methods to perform operations on the ticket table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    TicketService(TicketRepository ticketRepository)
    Constructs a new ticket service with the specified ticket repository.

    • bounceTicket

      public boolean bounceTicket(Integer ticketId)
      Bounces a ticket by their ID.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - the ID of the ticket to bounce
      Returns:
      true if the ticket was successfully bounced, false otherwise
